channel.title: Compling Error

item.title: Compling Error
item.dc:creator: @MagicPkz MagicPkz
item.description:
@MagicPkz wrote:

[quote=“Jordan15975, post:2, topic:285772”]Use this compiler, the message you recieve looks like it dosen’t work when you compile, but it does.

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

You’re welcome! :)[/quote]

Ha, I lol’d well, you left out a “}” or “{” somewhere.

Edit: Nvm, you already know that its missing, sorry, I cant help you there.

Read full topic

item.title: Compling Error
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

He has an error, it doesn’t mean his compiler’s messed up =P

item.title: Compling Error
item.dc:creator: @Jordan15975 Jordan15975
item.description:
@Jordan15975 wrote:

Use this compiler, the message you recieve looks like it dosen’t work when you compile, but it does.

@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

You’re welcome!

Read full topic
